reviewText: Very disappointed. I thought a book came with this.

I Am Loved Video Study is a great resource for learning to live knowing you are Loved by God. Wendy Blight is an authentic and Biblical rich  teacher.  She uses the Word of God to speak on the topic of God's love for us and uses His word to reinforce the teaching .  In addition, she uses personal and real life examples to illustrate God's Love and how he wants us to live as we are loved, to forgive, to love others, to discern lies that we tell ourselves and the world tells us and more.  Wendy Blight's teaching is full of challenges that are rewarding when taken bringing fulfillment in my relationship with God, relationships in my life and freedom from sin's bondage.  You wont' be disappointed if you take the time to do this study.
